w1.name: Bushwhack
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' lays a trap at the target location which becomes {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed}} after arming over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, lasting for up to 120 seconds and granting {{tip|sight}} within its radius. The trap will spring upon contact with an enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} per second over 4 seconds.

Traps have {{as|{{sti|health|6 '''maximum''' health}}}} and can only be damaged by champion [[basic attacks]] (2 hit points from {{tip|ranged}} and 3 hit points from {{tip|melee}}). Up to a maximum of {{pp|4 to 10 for 4|1 to 16}} traps may be active at once.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nidalee lays a trap at the target location which becomes stealthed after arming over 1.5 seconds, lasting for up to 120 seconds and granting sight within its radius. The trap will spring upon contact with an enemy, dealing them magic damage per second over 4 seconds.
Traps have 6 maximum health and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 hit points from ranged and 3 hit points from melee). Up to a maximum of 1 to 16 ‒ undefined traps may be active at once.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|10*4 to 50*4}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 5% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 20% AP)

q1.name: Javelin Toss
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' hurls a javelin in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy it hits, increased based on distance traveled.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Nidalee hurls a javelin in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits, increased based on distance traveled.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 150}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|210 to 450}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Javelin Toss'' will fire from wherever '''Nidalee''' was at the start of the cast time.
* The damage amplification is based on the distance from '''Nidalee's''' location at the ''end'' of the cast time to the struck target.
** {{Pending for test}}: distance to missile termination location or target center?

effects.str:
• Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Maximum Magic Damage: (+ 150% AP)

e1.name: Primal Surge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' evokes the spirit of the cougar, {{tip|healing}} the target allied champion or herself, increased by {{as|{{pp|label1=target's '''missing''' health|label=Heal increase|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}, and granting the target {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Nidalee evokes the spirit of the cougar, healing the target allied champion or herself, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined, and granting the target bonus attack speed for 7 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Heal|{{ap|35 to 115}} {{as|(+ {{fd|32.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Heal|{{ap|35*2 to 115*2}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 60}}%}}
e1.notes: * The {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} will persist through {{ai|Aspect of the Cougar 2|Nidalee|Cougar Form}} if '''Nidalee''' uses ''Primal Surge'' on herself.

effects.str:
• Minimum Heal: (+ 32.5% AP)
  • Maximum Heal: (+ 65% AP)

  • Bonus Attack Speed: %

r1.name: Aspect of the Cougar
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms herself into a cougar, gaining {{tip|melee}} attacks with {{sti|range|125 range}} as well as new [[Champion ability|abilities]].
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms herself into a human, gaining {{tip|ranged}} attacks with 525 {{sti|range}} as well as new [[Champion ability|abilities]].
Triggering {{ai|Prowl|Nidalee|Hunt}} resets ''Aspect of the Cougar's'' {{sti|cooldown}} if '''Nidalee''' is in human form.
'''Nidalee''' begins with one rank in ''Aspect of the Cougar'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nidalee transforms herself into a cougar, gaining melee attacks with 125 range as well as new Champion ability.
Active: Nidalee transforms herself into a human, gaining ranged attacks with 525 range as well as new Champion ability.
Triggering Hunt resets Aspect of the Cougar's cooldown if Nidalee is in human form.
Nidalee begins with one rank in Aspect of the Cougar and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
leveling: {{sbc|Cougar form's abilities rank up when ''{{ai|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' does}}
r1.notes: *Transformations do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.

effects.str: Cougar form's abilities rank up when Aspect of the Cougar does

i1.name: Prowl
description: {{sbc|Innate - Prowl:}} Being in {{tip|brush}} grants '''Nidalee''' {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|1400 range}} {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champion}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Hunt:}} Hitting {{tt|nearby|3000 range}} {{tip|monster|monsters}} or enemy champions with {{ai|Javelin Toss|Nidalee}} or {{ai|Bushwhack|Nidalee}} marks them as ''Hunted'', {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds and granting '''Nidalee''' {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the same duration, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|5500 range}} ''Hunted'' target. Additionally, '''Nidalee's''' first use of {{ai|Takedown|Nidalee}} and {{ai|Pounce|Nidalee}} against ''Hunted'' targets are empowered.
The {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} from ''Prowl'' and ''Hunt'' can stack, but cannot exceed {{as|30%|ms}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Prowl: Being in brush grants Nidalee 10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, increased to 30% when facing a nearby visible enemy champion.
Innate - Hunt: Hitting nearby monsters or enemy champions with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack marks them as Hunted, revealing them for 4 seconds and granting Nidalee 10% bonus movement speed for the same duration, increased to 30% when facing a nearby Hunted target. Additionally, Nidalee's first use of Takedown and Pounce against Hunted targets are empowered.
The bonus movement speed from Prowl and Hunt can stack, but cannot exceed 30%.

e2.name: Swipe
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' slashes her claws in an arc in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area.
e2.descriptionHtml: Active: Nidalee slashes her claws in an arc in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area.
leveling:
{{sbc|''{{ai|Swipe}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' rank}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 260 4}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
e2.notes:
* ''Swipe'' will fire from wherever '''Nidalee''' was at the start of the cast time.
** The visual effects will be seen from her position if she moves however.{{bug}}
e2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 50,60,70,80,90 as 50/60/70/80/90
e2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '6' as '6' and riot's value '12,12,12,12,12' as '12'

effects.str:
Swipe scales with Aspect of the Cougar's rank
  • Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)

q2.name: Takedown
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee's''' next [[basic attack]] within 10 seconds has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, gains {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' range}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}}, increased by an amount for every {{as|1% of target's '''missing''' health}}. The minimum damage can also be applied against {{tip|turret|turrets}}.
{{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' Bonus:}} ''Takedown'' deals {{ccs|40% increased damage|magic}} to ''Hunted'' targets.

''Takedown'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Nidalee's''' basic attack timer. Other damage converted to {{as|magic damage}} by ''Takedown'' are not increased by ''Takedown's'' respective effects.
q2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nidalee's next basic attack within 10 seconds has an uncancelable windup, gains 75 bonus range and is modified to deal magic damage, increased by an amount for every 1% of target's missing health. The minimum damage can also be applied against turrets.
Hunt Bonus: Takedown deals Unknown value: ccs 40% increased damage magic to Hunted targets.
Takedown resets Nidalee's basic attack timer. Other damage converted to magic damage by Takedown are not increased by Takedown's respective effects.
q2.notes:
* ''Takedown's'' attack deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* Increased damage to ''{{ai|Prowl||Hunted}}'' targets is displayed as a {{ccs|cosmetic critical strike|magic|tip=false|link=true}}: Unless '''Nidalee''' has critical strike chance and the attack rolled a {{tip|critical strike}} naturally, it is unaffected by critical damage modifiers.
* {{tip|basic attack|Basic attacks}} enhanced by ''Takedown'' convert {{nie|Spellblade}} damage from physical to magic, if it was not already magic. Their damage is however not increased by ''Takedown''.
* ''Takedown's'' damage will apply {{stil|life steal}}.
* {{pending for test}} - Parry interactions ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}}).
q2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 50,55,60,65,70 as 50/55/60/65/70
q2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|6|Starts post-effect}}' as '6/0' and riot's value '6,6,6,6,6' as '6'

w2.name: Pounce
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies upon arrival.

{{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' Bonus:}} '''Nidalee''' can perform ''Pounce'' from an increased range on a ''Hunted'' enemy closest to the cursor. '''Nidalee''' can ''Pounce'' to a target location near a ''Hunted'' enemy if she is close to the ''Hunted'' enemy.

[[Kill]]ing an enemy while in ''Cougar Form'' or using ''Pounce's'' ''Hunt'' bonus reduces ''Pounce's'' remaining {{sti|cooldown}} to a value. This has no effect if the remaining cooldown is already lower than that value.
''Pounce'' will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
w2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nidalee dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies upon arrival.
Hunt Bonus: Nidalee can perform Pounce from an increased range on a Hunted enemy closest to the cursor. Nidalee can Pounce to a target location near a Hunted enemy if she is close to the Hunted enemy.
Killing an enemy while in Cougar Form or using Pounce's Hunt bonus reduces Pounce's remaining cooldown to a value. This has no effect if the remaining cooldown is already lower than that value.
Pounce will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling:
{{sbc|''{{ai|Pounce}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' rank}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 210 4}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
w2.notes:
* '''Pounce''' will not receive the reduced cooldown if the target becomes ''Hunted'' mid-air.
* '''Pounce''' without a '''Hunted''' target will have a fixed distance and use [[Direction-targeted|direction-targeting]].
* '''Pounce''' in the direction of a '''Hunted''' target that is inside of normal ability range will use [[Location-targeted|location-targeting]] and place '''Nidalee''' at the target location.
* '''Pounce''' on a '''Hunted''' target that is out of normal ability range will use [[Unit-targeted|unit-targeting]] and place '''Nidalee''' on the side of the target that the target is facing.
w2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 40,45,50,55,60 as 40/45/50/55/60
w2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|6|Starts on cast}}' as '6/0' and riot's value '13,12,11,10,9' as '13/12/11/10/9'

Pounce scales with Aspect of the Cougar's rank
  • Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)
